20#include "config.h"
21#include "system.h"
22#include "coretypes.h"
23#include "context.h"
24#include "pass_manager.h"
25#include "dumpfile.h"
26#include "realmpfr.h"
27
28/* The singleton holder of global state: */
29gcc::context *g;
30
31gcc::context::context ()
32{
33 have_offload = false;
34
35 /* The pass manager's constructor uses the dump manager (to set up
36 dumps for the various passes), so the dump manager must be set up
37 before the pass manager. */
38 m_dumps = new gcc::dump_manager ();
39 m_passes = new gcc::pass_manager (this);
40}
41
42gcc::context::~context ()
43{
44 delete m_passes;
45 delete m_dumps;
46
47 /* Release MPFR caches to avoid Valgrind leak reports. */
48 mpfr_free_cache ();
49}
50
